root

Class Breeding

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.Breeding

  • public class Breeding
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles breeding between 2 monsters. A number of new monsters is produced based on their average fertility, the user who accepted the request gets all the children.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Breeding() 

    • Method Summary

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> doBreed(User u1, User u2, Monster m1, Monster m2)
      Initiates a breeding session between two monters.

    • Method Detail

      • doBreed

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> doBreed(User u1,
                                            User u2,
                                            Monster m1,
                                            Monster m2)
        Initiates a breeding session between two monters.
        Parameters:
        u1 - The owner of monster 1.
        u2 - The owner of monster 2.
        m1 - The monster that was put up for breeding.
        m2 - The monster that was accepted for breeding.
